title: Bug 43425Noncompliant annotations
description: A few of the annotations have compliance problem.javax.annotation.security.DenyAll@Target should only be METHODjavax.ejb.EJBmissing description propertyjavax.persistence.PersistenceContextmissing properties property and associated PersistenceProperty annotation classThe annotations can be verified by checking the JavaEE5 javadocs at http://java.sun.com/javaee/5/docs/api/I will post a patch to correct these problems.
